quote: He'd been a shy, quiet, bookish kid, and that had been painful; now he was a big dumb guy, and nobody expected him to be able to do anything more than move a sofa into the next room on his own.
quote_letters: HED BEEN A SHY QUIET BOOKISH KID AND THAT HAD BEEN PAINFUL NOW HE WAS A BIG DUMB GUY AND NOBODY EXPECTED HIM TO BE ABLE TO DO ANYTHING MORE THAN MOVE A SOFA INTO THE NEXT ROOM ON HIS OWN
